data.name: Freeway Fiasco Demo
data.detailed_description:
Freeway Fiasco is a time-bending puzzle game. The player must use the mysterious power of causality to affect traffic flow and prevent as many jams, deaths and humanoid-or-not explosions to save your soul from damnation.

Play through multiple levels of purgatory featuring different mechanics, as well as an original soundtrack to keep you company, in case you get lonely down there.
Key features:
Puzzles
On the road, you have to follow the rules. Navigate stop streets, use colour gates, and escape follow cars.
Story
Learn how the mysterious adjudicator became who he is today.
Original Music Score
